parameters.name: X-Fc-Account-Id
parameters.description: The ID of your Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Date
parameters.description: The time when the function is invoked. The value is in the **EEE,d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT** format.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description:
The Alibaba Cloud Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

>  You can use the value of this parameter to query information about the resource, such as the account, service, and region of the resource. You can manage tags only for services for top level resources.
